msbt.message: I set my alarm early today so I could enjoy 's morning in all its glory!I tell you, an early-morning stroll is the first step toward having an extraordinary day.
I woke up unusually early today. My morning stretches must be working because I'm ready for anything!
I should be getting my beauty rest right now. Alas, I woke up unusually early this morning. I tried to go back to sleepbut no luck. Goodness, I hope this insomnia doesn't ruin my complexion!
Surprised to see me up so late? I've become quite the night owl, my dear. My evening has just begun!
I tried and I tried, but I simply could NOT fall asleep tonight. I was terribly frustrated until I decided to go outside and feel the night air on my face! Now I'm quite pleased to be awake.
I sense you're a kindred soul You enjoy seeing at night, yes? Sleeping through all this seemed like such a waste. I intend to soak this evening in as long as possible!
